summary.hook: Spring-walking grandmother who answers morale dips with blossoms.
summary.gameplay: Random healer that pauses boss rage timers and feeds the party mid-chaos.
summary.why_it_matters: Her surprise entrances keep tension spikes fair and teach players to watch morale meters.

skills.name: Bloom Drop
skills.rationale: Full-coverage feed prevents wipe spirals during marathon fights.

skills.name: Sundial Blessing
skills.rationale: Briefly freezing enemy enrages gives designers room for difficulty spikes without frustration.

acquisition.spawn_logic: Trigger if morale < 40% and player finished two rooms without rest.

visuals.aura: Pastel petals spiraling from sky fractures.
visuals.animation_notes: Paint falling petals as additive sprites so even low-end canvas builds feel lush.
